name: Qiqi
title: Icy Resurrection
description: An apprentice and herb gatherer at Bubu Pharmacy. An undead with a bone-white complexion, she seldom has much in the way of words or emotion.

charged.1: Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes.

plunging.1: Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

description.0: Using the Icevein Talisman, Qiqi brings forth the Herald of Frost, dealing <cryo>Cryo DMG</cryo> to surrounding opponents.
3: On hit, Qiqi's Normal and Charged Attacks regenerate HP for your own party members and nearby teammates. Healing scales based on Qiqi's ATK.
Periodically regenerates your active character's HP.
Follows the character around, dealing <cryo>Cryo DMG</cryo> to opponents in their path.
description.5: I use this to prevent warming and rot... of Dr. Bai's precious ingredients. Yes.

description.0: Qiqi releases the adeptus power sealed within her body, marking nearby opponents with a Fortune-Preserving Talisman that deals <cryo>Cryo DMG</cryo>.
description.3: When opponents affected by this Talisman take DMG, the character that dealt this DMG regenerates HP.
description.5: "I am the Fortune Preserver, the Maiden of Resurrection."
description.6: â€” Qiqi does not remember these words.

description.0: When a character under the effects of Adeptus Art: Herald of Frost triggers an Elemental Reaction, their Incoming Healing Bonus is increased by 20% for 8s.
When Qiqi hits opponents with her Normal and Charged Attacks, she has a 50% chance to apply a Fortune-Preserving Talisman to them for 6s. This effect can only occur once every 30s.
Displays the location of nearby resources unique to Liyue on the mini-map.
When the Herald of Frost hits an opponent marked by a Fortune-Preserving Talisman, Qiqi regenerates 2 Energy.
Qiqi's Normal and Charge Attack DMG against opponents affected by <cryo>Cryo</cryo> is increased by 15%.
Increases the Level of Adeptus Art: Preserver of Fortune by 3.
Targets marked by the Fortune-Preserving Talisman have their ATK decreased by 20%.
Increases the Level of Adeptus Art: Herald of Frost by 3.
Using Adeptus Art: Preserver of Fortune revives all fallen party members nearby and regenerates 50% of their HP.
description.1: This effect can only occur once every 15 mins.
